row.process:
:SET &result# = ""
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#,"Checksum-Result: ")
: IF &pos# > 0 : SET &pos# = &pos# + 17 : SET &line# = MID(&line#,&pos#) : SET &result# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS
:PSET &UC4RB_OUT_CHECKSUM# = &result#
